mapper.select: SELECT A."shikibetsuCode", A."rirekiNo", A."daichoShubetsu", A."nyushoShisetsuCode", A."nyushoYMD", A."taishoYMD", B."jigyoshaName" FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" AS A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS B ON A."nyushoShisetsuCode" = B."jigyoshaNo" AND B."yukoKaishiYMD" = ( select max("yukoKaishiYMD") from rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" ) WHERE A."daichoShubetsu" = #{daichoShubetsu} AND A."taishoYMD" > A."nyushoYMD" AND A."shikibetsuCode" = #{shikibetsuCode} order by A."rirekiNo" Desc limit 1
